lead_paragraph: For the first time, one of the teams competing in the Olympic Games will be made up of refugees who hail from different countries they no longer call home.

headline.print_headline: 2 Judo Athletes From Congo Hope to Make Refugee Olympic Team
headline.main: 2 Judo Athletes From Congo Hope to Make Refugee Olympic Team

snippet: For the first time, one of the teams competing in the Olympic Games will be made up of refugees who hail from different countries they no longer call home....
